body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#bitcoin-core/gui/605](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/605) (Delete splash screen widget early by hebasto)
* [#bitcoin-core/gui/149](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/149) (Intro: Have user choose assumevalid by luke-jr)
* [#26621](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26621) (refactor: Continue moving application data from CNode to Peer by dergoegge)
* [#26606](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26606) (wallet: Implement independent BDB parser by achow101)
* [#26596](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26596) (wallet: Migrate legacy wallets to descriptor wallets without requiring BDB by achow101)
* [#26590](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26590) (net, refactor: Kill proxy globals by dergoegge)
* [#26298](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26298) (refactor: Move src/interfaces/*.cpp files to libbitcoin_common.a by ryanofsky)
* [#26238](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26238) (clang-tidy: fixup named argument comments by fanquake)
* [#26032](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26032) (wallet: skip R-value signature grinding for external signers by Sjors)
* [#25923](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25923) (p2p: always provide CNodeStateStats and getpeerinfo/netinfo/gui updates by jonatack)
* [#25665](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25665) (refactor: Add util::Result failure values, multiple error and warning messages by ryanofsky)
* [#25273](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25273) (wallet: Pass through transaction locktime and preset input sequences and scripts to CreateTransaction by achow101)
* [#22693](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22693) (RPC/Wallet: Add "use_txids" to output of getaddressinfo by luke-jr)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Concept ACK, I've only reviewed the option help yet but `-ipcconnect` SGTM as option name, it reminds of `-rpcconnect` of the `-cli` client.

I think this is the only case of multiple options separated by `,` inside the first argument of `ArgsManager::AddArg`. I don't know if it's strictly wrong, as it's not currently parsed in any way, but maybe the idea is to do so in the future. @MarcoFalke?
No plans right now to touch the command line help in any way, so this might be fine as is

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).

re: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19461#discussion_r452402137

> I think this is the only case of multiple options separated by `,` inside the first argument of `ArgsManager::AddArg`. I don't know if it's strictly wrong, as it's not currently parsed in any way, but maybe the idea is to do so in the future. @MarcoFalke?

Thanks, dropped nonstandard formatting and updated description in base PR #19460. No reason to separately list -no prefix.
